review: ARRR PEEEEE GEEEEE!!!/teamwipe 10/10 would get wipe again

-Started with 4 soldiers mission 2. -Alien killed one, another went to panic and threw grenade to the exact location where the team mates were. -Killed both of them, but managed somehow to finished the mission, proceed to extraction.11/10 would give grenades to manics again.
Haters gonna hateFanbois be fanboisBut you can't deny this masterpiece is the best since Shogun 210/10FOR CHAOS GODS
A Hideo Kojima's masterpiece. GG Konami. Better start investing in your pachinko.
